lead_paragraph: Nicolas Almagro recovered from a set down to beat fellow Spaniard Pablo Carreno Busta 6-7 (6), 7-6 (5), 6-3 and win the Estoril Open final on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Almagro Rallies to Beat Carreno Busta for Estoril Open Title
headline.main: Almagro Rallies to Beat Carreno Busta for Estoril Open Title

snippet: Nicolas Almagro recovered from a set down to beat fellow Spaniard Pablo Carreno Busta 6-7 (6), 7-6 (5), 6-3 and win the Estoril Open final on Sunday....
